message.body: Hey Jim, sorry for calling while you were driving; I didn't hear your voice mail until after I called. So, I'll be bringing in my stuff on Wednesday the 9th, probably around noon or early afternoon. I'll get you a better time frame at a later date.
I scheduled for a cable service installation on Thursday the 10th between 1PM and 3PM. I'll be around for both of these appointments.
I also contacted BGE 2 days ago and set up an account with them. If they haven't already, they should be contacting you.
